name: Gamesical
description:
Geek out and rock with your all-time favorite characters of Broadway’s biggest musicals! Remember to stay focused because everybody is out to steal the spotlight.

Instructions:
It’s show time! The curtain rises. The orchestra blares.  Listen to the musical track and identify the appropriate cast for each tune. But watch out! Characters from other shows are going to run towards the center of the stage. Those miscast must be flung off the stage before reaching the spotlight. Beware! As you level up there will be traps on stage and other challenges that could lead to curtains! Game Over!

BREAK A LEG!
